ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Level 26
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s interesting that he doesn t.  On Innoruuk (when I was there, at least), the standard was one group up top, some solo people in the room to the side,
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Harmonie Moonsong [mailto:harmoniemoonsong@...]
>
> Just out of curiosity, why dont ppl set up in the
> warrior and raider rooms... How do you know whose
> spawns are whose, and how do you pull thru each other?
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

It's interesting that he doesn't. On Innoruuk (when I was there, at
least), the standard was one group up top, some solo people in the room
to the side, one group apiece in raider and warrior with a mutual
agreement about how to split the ramp spawns.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 47 songs, Innoruuk
